thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 22 of 235
thread.title: DawnYSki

author: DawnYSki
title: DawnYSki
text: I didn't use Groupon very much - until recently. It all began when I was looking for a coupon to purchase wine, for a wedding gift, and then it led to me finding things for my new puppies. I really like the variety of merchandise and services available and the prices are ridiculous! I was able to get a $70 bottle of wine, etched with the bride and grooms name and wedding date, for only $29! It was a great savings. This isn't like other shopping sites, so for some of the items I ordered next day or 2nd day delivery was not available. The wait to have something delivered was worth it considering how much money I saved.
